lead_paragraph: A high level of parental involvement has helped Miraloma Elementary School go from being one of the poorest performing and least desirable schools in San Francisco to among the highest scoring on academic tests and the most coveted.
snippet: A high level of parental involvement has helped Miraloma Elementary School go from being one of the poorest performing and least desirable schools in San Francisco to among the highest scoring on academic tests and the most coveted.

headline.main: Where Manual Labor Is the Price of Academic Excellence
headline.print_headline: Where Manual Labor Is the Price of Academic Excellence
